subject: Re: Ghostair website
preview: Hi Josh,  Thank you so much for letting me know, happy that it turned out to be good.  Let me know if there's anything else I can do for you, always happy to help

full_threads.body:
Hi Josh,

Thank you so much for letting me know, happy that it turned out to be good.

Let me know if there's anything else I can do for you, always happy to help

Hi Allie,

I've reviewed the changes and everything looks good. Thank you for your assistance with this.

Regards,
Josh
Get Outlook for iOS
(Time: 55mins)

Hi Josh,

Thank you so much for your patience, and just confirming that the updates are now live on the site!

Here’s what we’ve updated:
  • Removed the Special Offer
  • Updated the price to $780 + GST per person (minimum 4 passengers)
  • Removed the “4 passengers max” note
    Updated the Fly to Lunch in Style section:
    • Removed Sandstone Point
    • Added Clouds Vineyard and Flaxton Gardens
  • Swapped in the new map graphic to reflect the changes

You can take a look here: ghostair.com.au

Let me know if there’s anything else you’d like me to tweak, always happy to help!

Hi Josh,

Happy Monday, and thank you so much for the go-ahead!

I’ll get things live and circle back with an update as soon as it’s all done. Really appreciate your patience!

Hi Allie,

Everything looks fine with the image and we're happy to go live.

Thanks again,

Josh

Get Outlook for iOS

Hi Josh,

Thanks so much for your patience! Just confirming, I've attached the image

Could you let me know if this looks good on your end? Once you confirm, I’ll go ahead and update the live images.

Appreciate your time, and happy to tweak anything if needed!

Hi Josh,

Perfect, thanks so much for the green light!

We’ll go ahead and pass this over to our designer now.

We’ll make sure it closely matches the SCH map layout, with the Ghost theme and branding you mentioned.

I’ll follow up as soon as it’s ready on our end.

Let me know if anything else comes up in the meantime, always happy to help!

Yes.. happy to move forward.
Get Outlook for iOS

Hi Josh,

No problem at all, thanks for clarifying!

We can absolutely make those changes:
  • Remove the track to Sandstone Point entirely
  • Clean up any remaining dotted lines, using the wine glass icon from the legend instead

The final version will match the SCH map layout closely, just with the Ghost theme/branding as you mentioned.

This revision should only take about 10–15 minutes on our end. There may be a small additional charge, would that be okay with you?

Just let us know and we’ll get it moving!

Hi Allie,

Apologies if I haven't been clear in my previous emails - I need the following done:
      •     Completely remove the track to Sandstone Point - we no longer offer this upgrade/destination in this package.
      •     Remove any remaining dotted lines - we're now using the wine glass icon in the legend to indicate the upgraded landing locations.

The map should end up almost identical to the SCH map, just with the Ghost theme/branding.

Also, can you let me know if these additional revisions will add to the total time that was originally quoted for?

Thanks,
Josh

Hi Josh,

Thank you so much for your patience

Just confirming the two updates you requested:
  • The dotted track line to Sandstone Point has been removed
  • The legend icon has been updated to a wine glass to reflect the upgraded landing locations

I've attached the updated version here, let me know if it’s all looking good on your end. Once approved, I'll change the picture on the live site.

Happy to make any final tweaks if needed!

Hi Josh,

Thank you so much for your feedback.

Will let our designer know. I'll get back to you as soon as we have updated the images.

Thank you so much for your patience 🙏

Hi Allie,

Thanks for sending this through-it's looking good! Could I please ask if the dotted track line that was going to Sandstone Point be removed, and also if the legend could be changed to a wine glass to indicate the upgraded landing locations?

Once those tweaks are made, I think we'll be all good to go.

Cheers,
Josh

Hi Josh,

Thanks so much for your patience!

Just a quick update, our design team has finished updating the map with the changes you requested. When you have a moment, could you please take a look and let me know if it’s all good to go?

Once we have your approval, we’ll get started on updating the map on the website.

Let me know if you spot anything that needs adjusting—happy to tweak as needed!

Hi Josh,

Thanks so much for confirming!

Just a quick heads-up, I’ve passed this along to our design team. They’ll update the existing map to reflect the changes (removing Sandstone Point and adding Clouds Vineyard and Flaxton Gardens).

As soon as we have the updated graphic ready, I’ll send it your way for approval before we go any further.

Let me know if there’s anything else you need in the meantime, happy to help!

Hi Allie,

Yes, that's correct-we'd like to keep the current map you marked with the red square, just updated to reflect the requested changes (remove Sandstone Point and add Clouds Vineyard and Flaxton Gardens).

I've also discussed this with our HOFO, and he's happy for us to proceed with the changes.

Thanks again!

Hi Josh,

Happy Friday!

Thank you so much for letting me know

Got it, you'd like the design to match the one on the website

Based on that project, I’d estimate around 45- 55 minutes to get everything sorted.

Let me know if you'd like me to go ahead!

Hi Allie,

Thanks for breaking that down and for confirming the timing and costs.

Just to clarify-the SCH map I provided was only an example to show the general locations. We'd actually like the Ghostair map updated so that the branding remains consistent across the site.

Once we have the amended time for the map changes, I'll forward this to our HOFO for approval.

Thanks again for your help!

Kind regards,
closing for now waiting for customer reply

Hi Josh,

Thanks for the update—and for sending through the map graphic! That’s super helpful.

Just a quick heads-up on timing and cost:
  • I saw you still have about 5 minutes left on your care plan
  • Based on the edits (removing the special offer, updating the price, removing the 4-passenger max, adjusting the tone, and swapping in the map), this should take around 20–25 minutes total

Since this is a small update and you've already provided the graphic, it’s pretty straightforward. Our rate for time beyond the plan is $109 per hour.

Just let me know if you'd like me to go ahead and make the changes!
